value:
There could be no greater Hero than
Lady Edelgard. If it will help me serve
her better, I am happy to be here.

What are you all fighting for? To me,
war is nothing more than a means to
an end—supporting Her Majesty.

The sooner I can return to the
Empire, the better...$k$pOh, but I couldn't possibly show my
face to Her Majesty without first
finding some souvenirs for her!

I suspect I have my keen eyesight to
thank, but I am actually quite adept at
hunting. Care to join me sometime?

I never forget what I've read, so I'm
gathering books from Askr. I'm sure
they will prove useful at some point.

Ah, you must be
$Nu.$k$pIn that case, I was asked to pass on a
few words to you from your friend
$Nf. Verbatim.
Now I can be even more useful!
Well, would you look at that?

I won't let this stand in the way of
my love...
I'll surely put this to good use.

I'm Monica von Ochs, eldest daughter
of the Adrestian Empire's Baron Ochs.
Now, where is Her Majesty?

Tell me... Have you ever had a brush
with death? I have, though that's not
the part of the memory that pains me.$k$pIt was the trouble I caused her. I was
kidnapped, and I knew I would soon
be killed. But then she came for me.$k$pLady Edelgard rescued me, despite
the risk of it costing everything—her
country, her people...even her life.$k$pNo matter what happens to me, I will
never allow that to happen again.$k$pAnd so... I pray that all of the battles
we've fought together may one day
be in service of Her Majesty.
I'll fight with everything I have!
Anything for Lady Edelgard!
You will not pass me!
I will give it my all!
Lady Edelgard...
When I think about Her Majesty... It's so inspiring.
Yes, your majesty? *pause* Oh, my mistake...
Should I prepare some tea and sweets?
If something is weighing you down, a good night's sleep will do the trick.
Oh, I'm just a minor noble. There's no need to mind your manners around me.
As long as Hubert does his job, everything should be all right...
Your words... know that I remember each and every one of them.
Of course.
Come again?
Let's be off.
